languages.text: "С самого начала между нами... не было непонимания. С самого начала роли были назначены... и приняты. Ты отличаешься от других. Ты знаешь правила игры. Ты хочешь выйти за рамки своего вида. Я долго наблюдал за тобой, {name}. И решил, что надо сделать последний шаг. Утвердить того, кто владеет, и того, кем владеют. Поставить печать". {n}Он поднимает клинок и внимательно смотрит вам в глаза, постепенно наступая на вас.{/n}

"Since the very beginning... we have understood one another perfectly. Since the very beginning, roles have been assigned... and accepted. You are different from the rest. You know the rules of the game. You want to transcend the limits of your species. I have watched you for a long time, {name}. And I have decided that the final step must be taken. To make explicit who is the possessor and who is the possessed. To set the seal." {n}He raises the blade and looks intently into your eyes, taking slow steps toward you.{/n}

languages.text: “你我从一开始……就心照不宣地彼此理解。从一开始，我们就分配好了彼此的角色……也接受了这样的角色。你与其他人都不一样，你了解游戏的规则，渴望超越物种的极限。我已经观察你很久了，{name}，而如今，我认为必须迈出最后一步了。我们必须明确究竟谁是主人，谁是奴仆，彻底确定我们之间的关系。”{n}他举起利刃，紧盯着你的双眼，慢慢地朝你走来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since the very beginning... we have understood one another perfectly. Since the very beginning, roles have been assigned... and accepted. You are different from the rest. You know the rules of the game. You want to transcend the limits of your species. I have watched you for a long time, {name}. And I have decided that the final step must be taken. To make explicit who is the possessor and who is the possessed. To set the seal." {n}He raises the blade and looks intently into your eyes, taking slow steps toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你我从一开始……就心照不宣地彼此理解。从一开始，我们就分配好了彼此的角色……也接受了这样的角色。你与其他人都不一样，你了解游戏的规则，渴望超越物种的极限。我已经观察你很久了，{name}，而如今，我认为必须迈出最后一步了。我们必须明确究竟谁是主人，谁是奴仆，彻底确定我们之间的关系。”{n}他举起利刃，紧盯着你的双眼，慢慢地朝你走来。{/n}

languages.text: 「初めから…俺達はお互いを完璧に理解していた。初めから、役割を与えられていて…それを受け入れてきた。お前は他の奴らとは違う。ゲームのルールを知っている。種族の限界を超えたいんだろう。ずっとお前を見てきたんだ、{name}。最後の一歩を踏み出す覚悟が固まったぜ。首輪をつける側とつけられる側、それがどちらかハッキリさせようぜ。決めろ」{n}マラズハイは刃を振り上げて目をじっと見つめながら、ゆっくりとこちらに歩み寄る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since the very beginning... we have understood one another perfectly. Since the very beginning, roles have been assigned... and accepted. You are different from the rest. You know the rules of the game. You want to transcend the limits of your species. I have watched you for a long time, {name}. And I have decided that the final step must be taken. To make explicit who is the possessor and who is the possessed. To set the seal." {n}He raises the blade and looks intently into your eyes, taking slow steps toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「初めから…俺達はお互いを完璧に理解していた。初めから、役割を与えられていて…それを受け入れてきた。お前は他の奴らとは違う。ゲームのルールを知っている。種族の限界を超えたいんだろう。ずっとお前を見てきたんだ、{name}。最後の一歩を踏み出す覚悟が固まったぜ。首輪をつける側とつけられる側、それがどちらかハッキリさせようぜ。決めろ」{n}マラズハイは刃を振り上げて目をじっと見つめながら、ゆっくりとこちらに歩み寄る。{/n}

languages.text: «Desde el principio... nos hemos entendido a la perfección. Desde el mismo principio nos repartimos los papeles... y los asumimos. Eres diferente a los demás. Tú conoces las reglas del juego. Deseas trascender los límites de tu especie. Llevo mucho tiempo observándote, {name}. Y he decidido que hemos de dar el paso final. Dejar bien claro quién posee y quién es la posesión. Con un sello indeleble». {n}Blande el puñal y te mira a los ojos con decisión mientras se acerca a ti lentamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since the very beginning... we have understood one another perfectly. Since the very beginning, roles have been assigned... and accepted. You are different from the rest. You know the rules of the game. You want to transcend the limits of your species. I have watched you for a long time, {name}. And I have decided that the final step must be taken. To make explicit who is the possessor and who is the possessed. To set the seal." {n}He raises the blade and looks intently into your eyes, taking slow steps toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Desde el principio... nos hemos entendido a la perfección. Desde el mismo principio nos repartimos los papeles... y los asumimos. Eres diferente a los demás. Tú conoces las reglas del juego. Deseas trascender los límites de tu especie. Llevo mucho tiempo observándote, {name}. Y he decidido que hemos de dar el paso final. Dejar bien claro quién posee y quién es la posesión. Con un sello indeleble». {n}Blande el puñal y te mira a los ojos con decisión mientras se acerca a ti lentamente.{/n}

languages.text: « Depuis le tout début, nous nous comprenons parfaitement. Nos rôles sont clairement définis... et mutuellement consentis. Vous n'êtes pas comme les autres. Vous connaissez les règles du jeu, vous cherchez à transcender les limites propres à votre espèce. À force de vous observer, {name}, je suis arrivé à la conclusion qu'il était temps de passer à l'étape finale. De proclamer haut et fort qui de nous deux est le maître, et qui l'esclave. De sceller nos liens une fois pour toutes. » {n}Il brandit sa lame et vous fixe d'un regard intense tout en s'approchant lentement de vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since the very beginning... we have understood one another perfectly. Since the very beginning, roles have been assigned... and accepted. You are different from the rest. You know the rules of the game. You want to transcend the limits of your species. I have watched you for a long time, {name}. And I have decided that the final step must be taken. To make explicit who is the possessor and who is the possessed. To set the seal." {n}He raises the blade and looks intently into your eyes, taking slow steps toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Depuis le tout début, nous nous comprenons parfaitement. Nos rôles sont clairement définis... et mutuellement consentis. Vous n'êtes pas comme les autres. Vous connaissez les règles du jeu, vous cherchez à transcender les limites propres à votre espèce. À force de vous observer, {name}, je suis arrivé à la conclusion qu'il était temps de passer à l'étape finale. De proclamer haut et fort qui de nous deux est le maître, et qui l'esclave. De sceller nos liens une fois pour toutes. » {n}Il brandit sa lame et vous fixe d'un regard intense tout en s'approchant lentement de vous.{/n}

languages.text: "Wir verstehen uns perfekt ... von Beginn an. Unsere Rollenverteilung ist seit Beginn klar ... und wird respektiert. Ihr seid anders als die anderen. Ihr versteht die Regeln des Spiels. Ihr wollt die Grenzen Eurer Art überwinden. Ich habe Euch lange beobachtet, {name}. Und ich habe beschlossen, dass Ihr den letzten Schritt gehen müsst. Um eindeutig festzulegen, wer der Besitzer und wer der Besessene ist. Das Siegel muss gesetzt werden." {n}Er erhebt die Klinge und schaut dir eindringlich in die Augen, während er langsam auf dich zugeht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since the very beginning... we have understood one another perfectly. Since the very beginning, roles have been assigned... and accepted. You are different from the rest. To make explicit who is the possessor and who is the possessed. To set the seal." {n}He raises the blade and looks intently into your eyes, taking slow steps toward you.{/n}

Um eindeutig festzulegen, wer der Besitzer und wer der Besessene ist. Das Siegel muss gesetzt werden." {n}Er erhebt die Klinge und schaut dir eindringlich in die Augen, während er langsam auf dich zugeht.{/n}

languages.text: "En başından beri... Birbirimizi mükemmel bir şekilde anladık. Daha en başından beri rollerimiz belliydi ve... Sen bunu kabul ettin. Geri kalanlardan farklısın. Oyunun kurallarını biliyorsun. Türünün sınırlarının ötesine geçmek istiyorsun. Seni uzun zamandır izliyorum {name}. Bu nedenle son adımı atmamız gerektiğine karar verdim. Kimin sahip olduğuyla kime sahip olunduğunu açıklığa kavuşturmak, bu işi kökünden halletmek için..." {n}Bıçağını kaldırarak imalı bakışlarla gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Sana doğru yavaşça adım atıyor.{/n}

You know the rules of the game. You want to transcend the limits of your species. I have watched you for a long time, {name}. And I have decided that the final step must be taken. To make explicit who is the possessor and who is the possessed. To set the seal." {n}He raises the blade and looks intently into your eyes, taking slow steps toward you.{/n}

Oyunun kurallarını biliyorsun. Türünün sınırlarının ötesine geçmek istiyorsun. Seni uzun zamandır izliyorum {name}. Bu nedenle son adımı atmamız gerektiğine karar verdim.
